quotes.quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-ExupÃ©ry

quotes.quote: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory. Tactics without strategy is the noise before defeat.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, and do whatever it takes to conquer them. Success is yours.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: It's not about perfect. It's about effort. And when you bring that effort every single day, that's where transformation happens. That's how change occurs.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, and dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got this.
quotes.author: Chantal Sutherland

quotes.quote: You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Believe in your dreams and they may come true; believe in yourself and they will come true.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Let your plans be dark and impenetrable as night, and when you move, fall like a thunderbolt.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: The difference between try and triumph is just a little umph!
quotes.author: Marvin Phillips

quotes.quote: It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Don't let the fear of striking out hold you back.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: If you don't stand for something, you will fall for anything.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
quotes.author: Aisha Tyler

quotes.quote: In the end, we only regret the chances we didn't take.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You can't start the next chapter of your life if you keep re-reading the last one.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Don't wait for opportunities, create them.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Believe in your abilities, your capabilities, and your own potential. Never let self-doubt hold you captive. You are worthy of all that you dream of and hope for.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: He who is prudent and lies in wait for an enemy who is not, will be victorious.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need not fear the result of a hundred battles.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: The true test of leadership is how well you function in a crisis.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Believe in your ability to create the life you want and take action towards it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Don't let your fears hold you back from pursuing your dreams.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Chase your dreams until you catch them...and then dream, catch, and dream again!
quotes.author: Dee Marie

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal, it's the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got this.
quotes.author: Chantal Sutherland

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: I never dream of success. I worked for it.
quotes.author: EstÃ©e Lauder

quotes.quote: A man who stands for nothing will fall for anything.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: You are the master of your own destiny. Use your strengths, follow your passion, and create the life you want.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Don't wait for opportunity, create it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Chase the vision, not the money, the money will end up following you.
quotes.author: Tony Hsieh

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If you want to make your dreams come true, the first thing you have to do is wake up.
quotes.author: J.M. Power

quotes.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Strive for progress, not perfection.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your attitude determines your direction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Random Guy

quotes.quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
quotes.author: Jimmy Johnson

quotes.quote: The good fighters of old first put themselves beyond the possibility of defeat, and then waited for an opportunity of defeating the enemy.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Your only limit is the one you set for yourself.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: All warfare is based on deception.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: The greatest victory is that which requires no battle.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Success is not a destination, it's a journey.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
quotes.author: Shiv Khera

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Life is a journey, and if you fall in love with the journey, you will be in love forever.
quotes.author: Peter Hagerty

quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Believe in the power of your dreams and the difference they can make in the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, and the rest will fall into place.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The art of war is of vital importance to the State. It is a matter of life and death, a road either to safety or to ruin.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: To know your Enemy, you must become your Enemy.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.quote: The harder the struggle, the more glorious the triumph.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you want to achieve greatness, stop asking for permission.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It's not about perfect. It's about effort. And when you bring that effort every single day, that's where transformation happens.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself that you can't achieve it.
quotes.author: Jordan Belfort
